rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
Segment does not contain a question.
This segment reports cases in multiple states/locations, bare facts.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports cases in states/locations, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
Reports numerical data ('Cases have been reported in at least 12 states') using a standard verb.
